<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- MachinePipeliner.h - Machine Software Pipeliner Pass -------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An implementation of the Swing Modulo Scheduling (SMS) software pipeliner.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Software pipelining (SWP) is an instruction scheduling technique for loops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that overlap loop iterations and exploits ILP via a compiler transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Swing Modulo Scheduling is an implementation of software pipelining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that generates schedules that are near optimal in terms of initiation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interval, register requirements, and stage count. See the papers:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Swing Modulo Scheduling: A Lifetime-Sensitive Approach&quot;, by J. Llosa,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A. Gonzalez, E. Ayguade, and M. Valero. In PACT &#39;96 Proceedings of the 1996</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conference on Parallel Architectures and Compilation Techiniques.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Lifetime-Sensitive Modulo Scheduling in a Production Environment&quot;, by J.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Llosa, E. Ayguade, A. Gonzalez, M. Valero, and J. Eckhardt. In IEEE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transactions on Computers, Vol. 50, No. 3, 2001</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;An Implementation of Swing Modulo Scheduling With Extensions for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Superblocks&quot;, by T. Lattner, Master&#39;s Thesis, University of Illinois at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Urbana-Champaign, 2005</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SMS algorithm consists of three main steps after computing the minimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initiation interval (MII).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Analyze the dependence graph and compute information about each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    instruction in the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Order the nodes (instructions) by priority based upon the heuristics</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    described in the algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) Attempt to schedule the nodes in the specified order using the MII.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;MACHINEPIPELINER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Represents a dependence between two instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c">SwingSchedulerDDGEdge</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;Dst = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Distance = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Creates an edge corresponding to an edge represented by \\p PredOrSucc and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p Dep in the original DAG. This pair has no information about the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// direction of the edge, so we need to pass an additional argument \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// IsSucc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c">SwingSchedulerDDGEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;PredOrSucc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;Dep, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSucc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : Dst(PredOrSucc), Pred(Dep), Distance(0u) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;Src = Dep.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a03a2dc5f9f321a2ce28f5c641dfe5455">getSUnit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsSucc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pred.setSUnit(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An anti-dependence to PHI means loop-carried dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred.getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732abe9561936346ab5c5e22fe544994b06e">SDep::Anti</a> &amp;&amp; Src-&gt;getInstr()-&gt;isPHI()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Distance = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::swap(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      auto Reg = Pred.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pred = SDep(Src, SDep::Kind::Data, Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the SUnit from which the edge comes (source node).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#ad81995fff228b0618a43adce97ba17a0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#ad81995fff228b0618a43adce97ba17a0">getSrc</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred.getSUnit(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the SUnit to which the edge points (destination node).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#a0aefcbe2a86ca46fe2922647b8fe59d3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#a0aefcbe2a86ca46fe2922647b8fe59d3">getDst</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Dst; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the latency value for the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#ac11386970c365363a170325ef4def4d9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#ac11386970c365363a170325ef4def4d9">getLatency</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred.getLatency(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Sets the latency for the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#a382e983c8430141b4cb68d074b6a82a0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddgedge/#a382e983c8430141b4cb68d074b6a82a0">setLatency</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a>) &#123; Pred.setLatency(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a>); &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the distance value for the edge.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if the edge represents output dependence.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A NodeSet contains a set of SUnit DAG nodes with additional information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that assigns a priority to the set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a596e6f47c1c842668452419086d6c097">NodeSet</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;</a> Nodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasRecurrence = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RecMII = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxMOV = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDepth = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Colocate = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;ExceedPressure = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Latency = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a954de16c021e57fb3c8e8143bdb428ca">SetVector&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;::const&#95;iterator</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a596e6f47c1c842668452419086d6c097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a596e6f47c1c842668452419086d6c097">NodeSet</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a802a019a7c7dbb3c15f7ce000c74fae4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a802a019a7c7dbb3c15f7ce000c74fae4">NodeSet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> S, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : Nodes(S, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>), HasRecurrence(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the latency of this node set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example to demonstrate the calculation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given: N0 -&gt; N1 -&gt; N2 -&gt; N0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edges:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (N0 -&gt; N1, 3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (N0 -&gt; N1, 5)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (N1 -&gt; N2, 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (N2 -&gt; N0, 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The total latency which is a lower bound of the recurrence MII is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// longest path from N0 back to N0 given only the edges of this node set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this example, the latency is: 5 + 2 + 1 = 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hold a map from each SUnit in the circle to the maximum distance from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// source node by only considering the nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg">SwingSchedulerDDG</a> &#42;DDG = DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a461d411e76e02e7a4ec0ca56098540aa">getDDG</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SUnit &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> SUnitToDistance;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> : Nodes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SUnitToDistance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = Nodes.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SUnit &#42;U = Nodes&#91;I - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SUnit &#42;V = Nodes&#91;I % Nodes.size()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      for (const SwingSchedulerDDGEdge &amp;Succ : DDG-&gt;getOutEdges(U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SUnit &#42;SuccSUnit = Succ.getDst();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (V != SuccSUnit)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">          continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (SUnitToDistance&#91;U&#93; + Succ.getLatency() &gt; SUnitToDistance&#91;V&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SUnitToDistance&#91;V&#93; = SUnitToDistance&#91;U&#93; + Succ.getLatency();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle a back-edge in loop carried dependencies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;FirstNode = Nodes&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;LastNode = Nodes&#91;Nodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a1a42c1ba878bd637f374197d05f0a97f">size</a>() - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PI : DDG-&gt;getInEdges(LastNode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have an order dep that is potentially loop carried then a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// back-edge exists between the last node and the first node that isn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modeled in the DAG. Handle it manually by adding 1 to the distance of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the last node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (PI.getSrc() != FirstNode || !PI.isOrderDep() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !DAG-&gt;isLoopCarriedDep(PI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">        continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SUnitToDistance&#91;FirstNode&#93; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::max(SUnitToDistance&#91;FirstNode&#93;, SUnitToDistance&#91;LastNode&#93; + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The latency is the distance from the source node to itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = SUnitToDistance&#91;Nodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a2309608beb7af149f7bf6158319ecfdb">front</a>()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#aba49350c71f099c58053900c4250b417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#aba49350c71f099c58053900c4250b417">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Nodes.insert(SU); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a2af89163b823f4392432f17d2fa72926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a2af89163b823f4392432f17d2fa72926">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> S, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a23b591c7cb04a054d9cafd9bf58e7757">iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &#123; Nodes.insert(S, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#ae0917c65a91dcc5e8fb0f1960354b8c2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnaryPredicate&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#ae0917c65a91dcc5e8fb0f1960354b8c2">remove&#95;if</a>(UnaryPredicate <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Nodes.remove&#95;if(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a56b9083f6d85aec6325b90028372d2e2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#a56b9083f6d85aec6325b90028372d2e2">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Nodes.count(SU); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Modulo Reservation Table. When a resource with ID R is consumed in cycle</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The number of scheduled micro operations for each slot. Micro operations</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return M satisfying Dividend = Divisor &#42; X + M, 0 &lt; M &lt; Divisor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The slot on MRT to reserve a resource for the cycle C is positiveModulo(C,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// II).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> positiveModulo(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Dividend, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Divisor)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Divisor &gt; 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R = Dividend % Divisor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      R += Divisor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class represents the scheduled code.  The main data structure is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// map from scheduled cycle to instructions.  During scheduling, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// data structure explicitly represents all stages/iterations.   When</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the algorithm finshes, the schedule is collapsed into a single stage,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which represents instructions from different loop iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The SMS algorithm allows negative values for cycles, so the first cycle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in the schedule is the smallest cycle value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#adb1ca08e3e0b9e280451db1aefa88151">SMSchedule</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the last cycle in the finalized schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#af238533c2437443030e5fa4a710094c5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#af238533c2437443030e5fa4a710094c5">getFinalCycle</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstCycle + InitiationInterval - 1; &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the cycle of the earliest scheduled instruction in the dependence</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Iterators for the cycle to instruction map.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ab877357d6d4a96d113e83608fe92fdc8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ab877357d6d4a96d113e83608fe92fdc8">sched&#95;iterator</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;int, std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt;</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">::iterator</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the instruction is scheduled at the specified stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a6455dfea4b357536881c7df8d7ca46d1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a6455dfea4b357536881c7df8d7ca46d1">isScheduledAtStage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageNum) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33">stageScheduled</a>(SU) == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)StageNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the stage for a scheduled instruction.  Return -1 if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the instruction has not been scheduled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a64379c9a0436bfd06da2e854c7fc9c33">stageScheduled</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::map&lt;SUnit &#42;, int&gt;::const&#95;iterator it = InstrToCycle.find(SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (it == InstrToCycle.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (it-&gt;second - FirstCycle) / InitiationInterval;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the cycle for a scheduled instruction. This function normalizes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the first cycle to be 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ac2afdd571841c61dc8f980fe3d6f4885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ac2afdd571841c61dc8f980fe3d6f4885">cycleScheduled</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::map&lt;SUnit &#42;, int&gt;::const&#95;iterator it = InstrToCycle.find(SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(it != InstrToCycle.end() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Instruction hasn&#39;t been scheduled.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (it-&gt;second - FirstCycle) % InitiationInterval;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the maximum stage count needed for this schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a336ecf423257d7f3b529f5817d9598c9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a336ecf423257d7f3b529f5817d9598c9">getMaxStageCount</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastCycle - FirstCycle) / InitiationInterval;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"></CodeLine>
